member.summary: Save the profile data to file.

param.name: path

param.para: The true if need to save proxy information; otherwise and default, false.

param.name: savePlugins
param.para: The true if need to save plugins information; otherwise and default, false.

param.name: saveLocalStorage
param.para: The true if need to save local storage information; otherwise and default, false.

param.name: saveTimezone
param.para: The true if need to save time zone information; otherwise and default, false.

param.name: saveGeoposition
param.para: The true if need to save geo information; otherwise and default, false.

param.name: saveSuperCookie
param.para: The true if need to save HSTS super cookie; otherwise and default, false.

param.name: saveFonts
param.para: The true if need to save font list; otherwise and default, false.

param.name: saveWebRtc
param.para: The true if need to save webrtc settings; otherwise and default, false.

param.name: saveIndexedDb
param.para: The true if need to save indexedDB; otherwise and default, false.

member.remarks: You should remember that all ZennoPoster's structures, actions and methods uses the utf-8 encoding.

requirements.para: Target Platforms: Desktop: Windows XP SP3 and older. Server: Windows Server 2003 and older.
